name: mvrladdd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)))

comment: Move RHS left addition to LHS. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)
